text: I have created a custom module for showing the banner area in various page
I have added fields for Banner Title , Banner description and Banner Background Image
I want to use that Banner Area module in different pages including the home page
but in few pages , Call to action button is required on the banner area , while on some pages it is not required
Is there any way to define dynammic call to action button for my Banner module so that only a single module can be used for both Banner with CTA button and Banner without CTA button.

Hi <@UJWH1GTNH> One way you can achieve that is with a boolean in the custom module "Include CTA?", then display the CTA field if toggle is on. On the output code you then have the {% if %} for the CTA
oh thats great!! it works . Thank you so much for this.
